Served in military prior to 1987 (0.06). The number of children of the respondent or the spouse that live in the household (0.73).

Number of children desired, 1982 survey (2.46). A variable that indicates if the respondent used marijuana prior to age 17 (0.43). A variable that indicates if the respondent experienced sexual intercourse prior to age 17 (0.39). A variable indicating that the respondent is married (0.44). A series of four variables indicating the religion the respondent was raised in. The emitted category includes the largest protestant group (Methodists, etc.). The category OIHER includes those who identified with no religion and other smaller categories (0.37, 0.01, 0.24, and 0.15). A variable that indicates the respondent does not reside with his or her parents or any other older relative such as Aunt, Uncle, Grandparent, etc (0.80).
